attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RBS bankers set to share millions in bonuses

Bankers at Royal Bank of Scotland, which is largely government owned, are set to share millions of pounds worth of bonuses, with the most senior figures in line for six-figure payouts. 

Not with my money !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
